overview_of_class: This is the laboratory course that accompanies Chemistry 171-0. This course focuses on the laboratory techniques that connect general chemistry concepts to applications in environmental science, materials science, chemical engineering, and more. Here the emphasis is on planning experiments, methods of data collection, interpretation of results, and clear communication of conclusions.
name: Advanced General Inorganic Chemistry Laboratory
title: WCAS CHEM 181-0-01 Advanced General Inorganic Chemistry Laboratory
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 171-0.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is the laboratory course that accompanies Chemistry 171-0. This course focuses on the laboratory techniques that connect general chemistry concepts to applications in environmental science, materials science, chemical engineering, and more. Here the emphasis is on planning experiments, methods of data collection, interpretation of results, and clear communication of conclusions.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: AP Score of 3 or better; IB Score of 5 or better; qualifying score on Chemistry Placement Exam (available only to incoming first-year students).

Must be taken concurrently with the Chem 171-0 lecture course.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Electronic Lab Notebook (details to be provided in course syllabus) ($30)
2. Approved laboratory safety eyewear ($10)
3. 100% Cotton laboratory coat ($45)

Items 2 and 3 to be sold during the first week of classes. Details TBA.

subject: CHEM
